properties.name: BEFORE_PLACE
properties.description: Dispatched before a SignatureField is placed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_PLACE
properties.description: Dispatched after a SignatureField is placed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: anchoredObjectSettings
properties.description: Anchored object settings.

properties.name: textWrapPreferences
properties.description: The text wrap preference properties that define the default formatting for wrapping text around objects.

properties.name: overridden
properties.description: If true, the object originated on a master spread and was overridden. If false, the object either originated on a master spread and was not overridden, or the object did not originate on a master page.

properties.name: overriddenMasterPageItem
properties.description: An object that originated on a master page and has been overridden. Can return: PageItem, Guide, Graphic, Movie or Sound.

properties.name: parentPage
properties.description: The page on which this page item appears.

properties.name: allPageItems
properties.description: Lists all page items contained by the SignatureField.

properties.name: allGraphics
properties.description: Lists all graphics contained by the SignatureField.

properties.name: animationSettings
properties.description: The page item animation settings.

properties.name: timingSettings
properties.description: The object timing settings.

properties.name: associatedXMLElement
properties.description: The XML element associated with the SignatureField.

properties.name: linkedPageItemOptions
properties.description: Linked Page Item options

properties.name: allArticles
properties.description: The list of all articles this page item is part of

properties.name: transparencySettings
properties.description: Transparency settings.

properties.name: strokeTransparencySettings
properties.description: Transparency settings for the stroke.

properties.name: fillTransparencySettings
properties.description: Transparency settings for the fill applied to the SignatureField.

properties.name: contentTransparencySettings
properties.description: Transparency settings for the content of the SignatureField.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of the SignatureField.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the SignatureField (a Character, Spread, MasterSpread, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Group, PlaceGun or Snippet).

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the SignatureField within its containing object.

properties.name: images
properties.description: A collection of bitmap images in any bitmap file format (including TIFF, JPEG, or GIF).

properties.name: graphics
properties.description: A collection of imported graphics in any graphic file format (vector, metafile, or bitmap).

properties.name: pageItems
properties.description: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container (such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

properties.name: epss
properties.description: A collection of EPS files.

properties.name: wmfs
properties.description: A collection of WMF graphics.

properties.name: picts
properties.description: A collection of PICT graphics.

properties.name: pdfs
properties.description: A collection of PDF files.

properties.name: groups
properties.description: A collection of groups.

properties.name: epstexts
properties.description: EPSTexts

properties.name: preferences
properties.description: A collection of preferences objects.

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: ovals
properties.description: A collection of ellipses.

properties.name: splineItems
properties.description: The spline items collection.

properties.name: rectangles
properties.description: A collection of rectangles.

properties.name: graphicLines
properties.description: A collection of graphic lines.

properties.name: textFrames
properties.description: A collection of text frames.

properties.name: polygons
properties.description: A collection of polygons.

properties.name: submitFormBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of submit form behavior objects.

properties.name: behaviors
properties.description: A collection of behavior objects.

properties.name: clearFormBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of clear form behavior objects.

properties.name: printFormBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of print form behavior objects.

properties.name: viewZoomBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of view zoom behavior objects.

properties.name: soundBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of sound behavior objects.

properties.name: showHideFieldsBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of show/hide fields behavior objects.

properties.name: movieBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of movie behavior objects.

properties.name: gotoAnchorBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of goto anchor behavior objects.

properties.name: gotoFirstPageBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of goto first page behavior objects.

properties.name: gotoLastPageBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of goto last page behavior objects.

properties.name: gotoNextPageBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of goto next page behavior objects.

properties.name: gotoPreviousPageBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of goto previous page behavior objects.

properties.name: gotoNextViewBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of goto next view behavior objects.

properties.name: gotoPreviousViewBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of goto previous view behavior objects.

properties.name: gotoURLBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of goto URL behavior objects.

properties.name: openFileBehaviors
properties.description: A collection of open file behavior objects.

properties.name: svgs
properties.description: A collection of SVG files.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: If true, the form field is read only in the exported PDF.

properties.name: required
properties.description: If true, the form field is required in the exported PDF.

properties.name: printableInPdf
properties.description: If true, the form field/push button is printable in the exported PDF.

properties.name: hiddenUntilTriggered
properties.description: If true, the form field/push button is hidden until triggered in the exported PDF.

properties.name: activeStateIndex
properties.description: The index of the active state in the object's states collection.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the SignatureField.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the SignatureField.

properties.name: allowOverrides
properties.description: If true, the master page item can be overridden.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: If true, the SignatureField is visible.

properties.name: topLeftCornerOption
properties.description: The shape to be applied to the top left corner of rectangular shapes and all corners of non-rectangular shapes.Note: corner option differs from end join in which you can set a radius for a corner option, whereas the rounded or beveled effect of an end join depends on the stroke weight.

properties.name: topRightCornerOption
properties.description: The shape to apply to the top right corner of rectangular shapes

properties.name: bottomLeftCornerOption
properties.description: The shape to apply to the bottom left corner of rectangular shapes.

properties.name: bottomRightCornerOption
properties.description: The shape to apply to the bottom right corner of rectangular shapes.

properties.name: topLeftCornerRadius
properties.description: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the top left corner of rectangular shapes and all corners of non-rectangular shapes

properties.name: topRightCornerRadius
properties.description: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the top right corner of rectangular shapes

properties.name: bottomLeftCornerRadius
properties.description: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the bottom left corner of rectangular shapes

properties.name: bottomRightCornerRadius
properties.description: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the bottom right corner of rectangular shapes

properties.name: horizontalLayoutConstraints
properties.description: The left margin, width, and right margin constraints this item is subject to when using the object-based layout rule.

properties.name: verticalLayoutConstraints
properties.description: The top margin, height, and bottom margin constraints this item is subject to when using the object-based layout rule.

properties.name: geometricBounds
properties.description: The bounds of the SignatureField excluding the stroke width, in the format [y1, x1, y2, x2], which give the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the bounding box.

properties.name: visibleBounds
properties.description: The bounds of the SignatureField including the stroke width, in the format [y1, x1, y2, x2], which give the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the bounding box.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the SignatureField. . Can also accept: String.

properties.name: fillTint
properties.description: The percent of tint to use in the SignatureField's fill color. (To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

properties.name: overprintFill
properties.description: If true, the SignatureField's fill color overprints any underlying objects. If false, the fill color knocks out the underlying colors.

properties.name: strokeWeight
properties.description: The weight (in points) to apply to the SignatureField's stroke.

properties.name: miterLimit
properties.description: The limit of the ratio of stroke width to miter length before a miter (pointed) join becomes a bevel (squared-off) join.

properties.name: endCap
properties.description: The end shape of an open path.

properties.name: endJoin
properties.description: The corner join applied to the SignatureField.

properties.name: strokeType
properties.description: The name of the stroke style to apply. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: strokeCornerAdjustment
properties.description: The corner adjustment applied to the SignatureField.

properties.name: strokeDashAndGap
properties.description: The dash and gap measurements that define the pattern of a custom dashed line. Define up to six values (in points) in the format [dash1, gap1, dash2, gap2, dash3, gap3].

properties.name: leftLineEnd
properties.description: The arrowhead applied to the start of the path.

properties.name: rightLineEnd
properties.description: The arrowhead applied to the end of the path.

properties.name: strokeColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the SignatureField. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: strokeTint
properties.description: The percent of tint to use in object's stroke color. (To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

properties.name: gradientFillStart
properties.description: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the fill of the SignatureField, in the format [x, y].

properties.name: gradientFillLength
properties.description: The length (for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the fill of the SignatureField.

properties.name: gradientFillAngle
properties.description: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the SignatureField. (Range: -180 to 180)

properties.name: gradientStrokeStart
properties.description: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the stroke of the SignatureField, in the format [x, y].

properties.name: gradientStrokeLength
properties.description: The length (for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the stroke of the SignatureField.

properties.name: gradientStrokeAngle
properties.description: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the stroke of the SignatureField. (Range: -180 to 180)

properties.name: overprintStroke
properties.description: If true, the SignatureField's stroke color overprints any underlying objects. If false, the stroke color knocks out the  underlying colors.

properties.name: gapColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of a dashed, dotted, or striped stroke. For information, see stroke type.

properties.name: gapTint
properties.description: The tint as a percentage of the gap color. (To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

properties.name: overprintGap
properties.description: If true, the gap color overprints any underlying colors. If false, the gap color knocks out the underlying colors.

properties.name: strokeAlignment
properties.description: The stroke alignment applied to the SignatureField.

properties.name: nonprinting
properties.description: If true, the SignatureField does not print.

properties.name: itemLayer
properties.description: The layer that the SignatureField is on.

properties.name: locked
properties.description: If true, the SignatureField is locked.

properties.name: localDisplaySetting
properties.description: Display performance options for the SignatureField.

properties.name: rotationAngle
properties.description: The rotatation angle of the SignatureField. (Range: -360 to 360)

properties.name: shearAngle
properties.description: The skewing angle applied to the SignatureField. (Range: -360 to 360)

properties.name: horizontalScale
properties.description: The horizontal scaling applied to the SignatureField.

properties.name: verticalScale
properties.description: The vertical scaling applied to the SignatureField.

properties.name: absoluteRotationAngle
properties.description: The rotation angle of the SignatureField relative to its containing object. (Range: -360 to 360)

properties.name: absoluteShearAngle
properties.description: The skewing angle of the SignatureField relative to its containing object. (Range: -360 to 360)

properties.name: absoluteHorizontalScale
properties.description: The horizontal scale of the SignatureField relative to its containing object.

properties.name: absoluteVerticalScale
properties.description: The vertical scale of the SignatureField relative to its containing object.

properties.name: appliedObjectStyle
properties.description: The object style applied to the SignatureField.

properties.name: flip
properties.description: The direction in which to flip the printed image.

properties.name: absoluteFlip
properties.description: Indicates whether the SignatureField has been flipped independently of its parent object and, if yes, the direction in which the SignatureField was flipped.

properties.name: arrowHeadAlignment
properties.description: The arrowhead alignment applied to the SignatureField.

properties.name: leftArrowHeadScale
properties.description: The scaling applied to the arrowhead at the start of the path. (Range: 1 to 1000)

properties.name: rightArrowHeadScale
properties.description: The scaling applied to the arrowhead at the end of the path. (Range: 1 to 1000)

properties.name: label
properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: convertToObject
methods.description: Converts the button object to the page item currently in the active state. Page items from other states will be lost.

methods.name: bringToFront

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: The reference object to bring the object in front of (must have same parent) (Optional)

methods.description: Brings the SignatureField to the front of its layer or in front of a particular item.

methods.name: sendToBack

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: The reference object to send the object behind (Optional)

methods.description: Sends the SignatureField to the back of its layer or behind a particular item (must have same parent).

methods.name: bringForward
methods.description: Brings the SignatureField forward one level in its layer.

methods.name: sendBackward
methods.description: Sends the SignatureField back one level in its layer.

methods.name: convertShape

parameters.name: given
parameters.description: The SignatureField's new shape.

parameters.name: numberOfSides
parameters.description: The number of sides for the resulting polygon. (Range: 3 to 100) (Optional)

parameters.name: insetPercentage
parameters.description: The star inset percentage for the resulting polygon. (Range: 0.0 to 100.0)  (Optional)

parameters.name: cornerRadius
parameters.description: The corner radius of the resulting rectangle. (Optional)

methods.description: Converts the SignatureField to a different shape.

methods.name: override

parameters.name: destinationPage
parameters.description: The document page that contains the master page item to override.

methods.description: Overrides a master page item and places the item on the document page as a new object.

methods.name: removeOverride
methods.description: Removes the override from a previously overridden master page item.

methods.name: detach
methods.description: Detaches an overridden master page item from the master page.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes the SignatureField.

methods.name: fit

parameters.name: given
parameters.description: The fit option to use.

methods.description: Applies the specified fit option to content in a frame.

methods.name: flipItem

parameters.name: given
parameters.description: The axis around which to flip the SignatureField.

parameters.name: around
parameters.description: The point around which to flip the SignatureField. Can accept: Array of 2 Units or AnchorPoint enumerator. (Optional)

methods.description: Flips the SignatureField.

methods.name: duplicate

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The location of the new SignatureField, specified in coordinates in the format [x, y]. Can accept: Array of 2 Units, Spread, Page or Layer. (Optional)

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: Amount by which to offset the new SignatureField from the original SignatureField's position. (Optional)

methods.description: Duplicates the SignatureField at the specified location or offset.

methods.name: move

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The new location of the SignatureField,in the format (x, y). Can accept: Array of 2 Units, Spread, Page or Layer. (Optional)

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: The amount (in measurement units) to move the SignatureField relative to its current position, in the format (x, y). (Optional)

methods.description: Moves the SignatureField to a new location. Note: Either the 'to' or 'by' parameter is required; if both parameters are defined, only the to value is used.

methods.name: applyObjectStyle

parameters.name: using
parameters.description: The object style to apply.

parameters.name: clearingOverrides
parameters.description: If true, clears the SignatureField's existing attributes before applying the style. (Optional)

parameters.name: clearingOverridesThroughRootObjectStyle
parameters.description: If true, clears attributes and formatting applied to the SignatureField that are not defined in the object style. (Optional)

methods.description: Applies the specified object style.

methods.name: clearObjectStyleOverrides
methods.description: Clear overrides for object style

methods.name: clearTransformations
methods.description: Clears transformations from the SignatureField. Transformations include rotation, scaling, flipping, fitting, and shearing.

methods.name: transform

parameters.name: in
parameters.description: The coordinate space to use

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The temporary origin during the transformation. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameters.name: withMatrix
parameters.description: Transform matrix. Can accept: Array of 6 Reals or TransformationMatrix.

parameters.name: replacingCurrent
parameters.description: Transform components to consider; providing this optional parameter causes the target's existing transform components to be replaced with new values.  Without this parameter, the given matrix is concatenated onto the target's existing transform combining the effect of the two. Can accept: MatrixContent enumerator, Array of MatrixContent enumerators or Long Integer. (Optional)

parameters.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameters.description: If true then a ruler based origin is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

methods.description: Transform the page item.

methods.name: transformValuesOf

parameters.name: in
parameters.description: The coordinate space to use

methods.description: Get the transformation values of the page item.

methods.name: resolve

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location requested. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameters.name: in
parameters.description: The coordinate space to use.

parameters.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameters.description: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

methods.description: Get the coordinates of the given location in the specified coordinate system.

methods.name: redefineScaling

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The scale factors to be left on the item.  The default is {1.0, 1.0}. (Optional)

methods.description: Apply an item's scaling to its content if possible.

methods.name: resize

parameters.name: in
parameters.description: The bounding box to resize. Can accept: CoordinateSpaces enumerator, BoundingBoxLimits enumerator or Ordered array containing coordinateSpace:CoordinateSpaces enumerator, boundsKind:BoundingBoxLimits enumerator.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The transform origin. Legal specifications: relative to bounding box: anchor | {anchor | {x,y}, bounds kind [, coordinate space]}; relative to coordinate space: {x,y} | {{x,y}[, coordinate space]}; relative to layout window ruler: {{x,y}, page index | bounds kind}. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: How the current dimensions are affected by the given values

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: The width and height values. Legal dimensions specifications: {x, y [, coordinate space]}, {x, resize constraint [, coordinate space]}, or {resize constraint, y [, coordinate space]}; where x and y are real numbers and coordinate space is used to determine _only_ the unit of length for x and y; coordinate space is ignored for the 'current dimensions times' resize method). Can accept: Array of Reals, ResizeConstraints enumerators or CoordinateSpaces enumerators.

parameters.name: resizeIndividually
parameters.description: If false and multiple page items are targeted, the new dimensions are attained only by moving the individual items rather than resizing them. (Optional)

parameters.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameters.description: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

methods.description: Resize the page item.

methods.name: reframe

parameters.name: in
parameters.description: The bounding box to resize. Can accept: CoordinateSpaces enumerator or Ordered array containing coordinateSpace:CoordinateSpaces enumerator, boundsKind:BoundingBoxLimits enumerator.

parameters.name: opposingCorners
parameters.description: Opposing corners of new bounding box in the given coordinate space

methods.description: Move the bounding box of the page item

methods.name: transformAgain
methods.description: Transforms the SignatureField using the last transformation performed on any object. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

methods.name: transformSequenceAgain
methods.description: Transforms the SignatureField using the last sequence of transform operations performed on any single object or performed at the same time on any group of objects. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

methods.name: transformAgainIndividually
methods.description: Transforms the SignatureField using the last transformation performed on any SignatureField. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

methods.name: transformSequenceAgainIndividually
methods.description: Transforms the SignatureField using the last sequence of transformations performed on any single object or performed at the same time on any group of objects. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

methods.name: placeXML

parameters.name: using
parameters.description: The XML element whose content you want to place.

methods.description: Places XML content into the specified object. Note: Replaces any existing content.

methods.name: autoTag
methods.description: Tag the object or the parent story using default tags defined in XML preference.

methods.name: markup

parameters.name: using
parameters.description: The XML element.

methods.description: Associates the page item with the specified XML element while preserving existing content.

methods.name: contentPlace

parameters.name: pageItems
parameters.description: One or more page items to place or load

parameters.name: linkPageItems
parameters.description: Whether to link pageItems in content placer (if true it will override link stories value) (Optional)

parameters.name: linkStories
parameters.description: Whether to link stories in content placer (only applicable for single story, pageItem links will also be created in case of more than one item) (Optional)

parameters.name: mapStyles
parameters.description: Whether to map styles in content placer (Optional)

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.description: Whether to display the link options dialog (Optional)

methods.description: Duplicate an object and place it into the target page item.

methods.name: exportFile

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The path to the export file.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.description: If true, displays the export options dialog. (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.description: The export style. (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.description: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

methods.description: Exports the object(s) to a file.

methods.name: asynchronousExportFile

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The path to the export file.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.description: If true, displays the export options dialog. (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.description: The export style. (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.description: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

methods.description: asynchronously exports the object(s) to a file.

methods.name: select

parameters.name: existingSelection
parameters.description: The selection status of the SignatureField in relation to previously selected objects. (Optional)

methods.description: Selects the object.

methods.name: findObject

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.description: Finds objects that match the find what value.

methods.name: changeObject

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.description: Finds objects that match the find what value and replace the objects with the change to value.

methods.name: createPlainTextQRCode

parameters.name: plainText
parameters.description: QR code Plain Text  (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.description: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new SignatureField. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

methods.description: Create Plain Text QR Code on the page item

methods.name: createHyperlinkQRCode

parameters.name: urlLink
parameters.description: QR code Hyperlink URL  (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.description: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new SignatureField. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

methods.description: Create Hyperlink QR Code on the page item or document

methods.name: createTextMsgQRCode

parameters.name: cellNumber
parameters.description: QR code Text Phone Number (Optional)

parameters.name: textMessage
parameters.description: QR code Text Message (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.description: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new SignatureField. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

methods.description: Create Text Msg QR Code on the page item or document

methods.name: createEmailQRCode

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.description: QR code Email Address (Optional)

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: QR code Email Subject (Optional)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: QR code Email Body Message (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.description: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new SignatureField. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

methods.description: Create Email QR Code on the page item or document

methods.name: createVCardQRCode

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: QR code Business Card First Name (Optional)

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Last Name (Optional)

parameters.name: jobTitle
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Title (Optional)

parameters.name: cellPhone
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Cell Phone Number (Optional)

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Phone Number (Optional)

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Email Address (Optional)

parameters.name: organisation
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Organisation (Optional)

parameters.name: streetAddress
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Street Address (Optional)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: QR code Business Card City (Optional)

parameters.name: adrState
parameters.description: QR code Business Card State (Optional)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Country (Optional)

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: QR code Business Card Postal Code (Optional)

parameters.name: website
parameters.description: QR code Business Card URL (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.description: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties

methods.name: store

parameters.name: using
parameters.description: The library in which to store the object.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new SignatureField (Optional)

methods.description: Stores the object in the specified library.

methods.name: insertLabel

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value.

methods.description: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: extractLabel

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key.
